attributes.action: stop police corruption,police informers must not be allowed to get away with criume
attributes.additional_details: get bad police out  ,no more deals with criminals .get respect back from people .people need to respect and trust our police,we dont ,we cant there behaviour is appaulling in HAMPSHIRE ,most of the criminals are in with police one way or other...it is terrible WE WANT THE GOOD OLD RESPECTED POLICE MAN BACK....NO MORE GRASSING ON EACH OTHER...if you dont want to do the time,DONT DO THE CRIME..
